14 // Cf Controller::chooseVelocities(...)
15 void FileCtrl::chooseVelocities(double& trans_vel, double& rot_vel,
16  std::ostringstream& log_str) {
17  static double remain_dur = 0, duration, moving_acc, turning_acc;
18  if ( inputOK() ) {
19  if ( Object::isZero(remain_dur) ) {
20  // read new line in input stream
21  *input >> duration >> moving_acc >> turning_acc;
22  if ( inputEnded() )
23  { moving_acc = turning_acc = 0; duration = 10; }
24  remain_dur += duration;
25  }
26  motion_model.applyAccelerations
27  (moving_velocity, turning_velocity,
28  moving_acc, turning_acc, time_step); /*
29  log_str << "+(" << moving_acc << ", " << turning_acc
30  << ", " << time_step << "/" << remain_dur << ")"; */
31  updateVelocities(trans_vel, rot_vel);
32  remain_dur -= time_step;
33  } // end of if (input OK)
34 } // end of void FileCtrl::chooseVelocities(double&, double&, ...) ---
